title: Harnessing the Power of Chlorogenic Acid: Inhibiting IL-2-Mediated Treg Upregulation to Combat Post-Traumatic Osteomyelitis.
abstract: Chlorogenic acid (CGA) exerts immunomodulatory effects by regulating the proportion of regulatory T cells (Tregs), and T-cell dysregulation is a known feature of post-traumatic osteomyelitis (PTO). This study explored the mechanism of CGA in the treatment of PTO from the perspective of T-cell immunity.
